name: Forum Nachhaltige Geldanlage
goal: Forum Nachhaltige Geldanlagen (FNG), founded in 2001, is the industry association promoting sustainable investment in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. It has over 160 corporate members, including banks, investment management companies, insurance companies, rating agencies, investment companies, asset managers, financial advisers and NGOs, and around 30 individual members.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
euInitiatives: HLEG on Sustainable Finance and all other legislative measures and projects with regard to Sustainable Finance in the EU (e.g. CSR-directive-Review, Directives IORPII and Shareholder Rights, ESA-Review, PRIIPS)
